description:
Carson recently turned 18, and he and his girlfriend have both decided to do porn to make ends meet. He of course is finding it challenging to break into the straight market, so she has been encouraging him to do gay porn. I dunno, he was of those guys that has a little sugar there that sets may gaydar off, maybe it will yours?
Regardless, he was way into the straight video I had for him.
Also, do straight videos have a Twink category? All the straight films I have on set for the guys to watch, the dudes are either not that great, OR really big and buff. Well, he fits into the Twink category quite nicely for gay videos.
He really seemed on the fence on doing more, and as of writing this summary, he hadn't decided to do more or not.
Pretty sure his girlfriend will convince him to do video "sometime" and pretty sure it will be with ChaosMen, but we will have to wait and see!
title: Carson Temple - Solo
